posts.post_content:
Long time autograph collector and I've decided to get some of the cards I've always wanted, and they just so happen to all be t205s.  I don't really care whats on the back, but I want the front to be in reasonable condition:

Bresnahan
Brown
Chance
Evers
Ewing
Huggins
Mathewson
Marquard
Mcgraw
Merkle
Tinker
Wheat

Please send images/offers to [url]joshmargolin@gmail.com[/url], and thanks for checking out my post.
Let me update this.  I'm interested really in any t205s anyone is willing to sell.  Again, I'm looking for something raw or graded at or below a 4.  Thanks.
Email sent with a list of cards along with scans.
